name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: USMCA is:1) only modest change to NAFTA, 2) leaves us far worse off than where we were the day before Trump took office when we had NAFTA intact and not under siege, US in the TPP, no tariffs on Canadian or Mexican steel and aluminum and no retaliatory tariffs on US exports.//t.co/p2d0JWvBfE

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Very sad news the closure of @ICTSD. Its support and leading voice on trade and sustainable development will be dearly missed.//t.co/29rY1pIDPk

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: A sad day leaving a big hole in the critical dialogue on trade and sustainable development and at a time when trade and climate needs deeper understanding and new spaces for dialogue and then action. The work needs to go on. Signing off as a reader of @ICTSD_Bridges for ever.//t.co/LGfHXszrcI

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Sad to hear that @ICTSD is ending its work due to financial problems - the interaction between trade, sustainable development and climate is vital and we need more work on this in future - hope you can find ways to continue @RMelendezOrtiz

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Sorry to see this. Your outfit is a go-to one, and surely it should remain so.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Saddened to read this. Big loss to Geneva + international trade & devpt community. Please let us know if there is anything we might do.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges Saddened to hear the news. A great loss for the sustainable development community and trade intelligence! Just when multilateralism needed much support! Thanks to all the ICTSD family for the hard work. Will be greatly missed.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Very sad news! What a loss 4 the #trade #policy community. I have always greatly enjoyed reading your publications. Thank U so much @RMelendezOrtiz & @ICTSD team for your amazing work. At this critical juncture, we need intelligent takes on trade policy more than ever! #Tragic.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Very sad news! What a loss 4 the #trade #policy community. I have always greatly enjoyed reading your publications. Thank U so much @RMelendezOrtiz & @ICTSD team for your amazing work. At this critical juncture, we need intelligent takes on trade policy more than ever! #Tragic.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSDAG I'm especially grateful to current + former colleagues @andrewncrosby @ammadnb , @pghisu1, @StephenYouChen, @Jana_Eckei, @theangelibanez, @shanzmahmood, @rebeccaspohrer, @AnjaZiAcosta, @MrCPRuck, @SMahesh_ictsd + many others not on twitter... Thank you!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK I know exactly how you feel as we went through the same with @ARTNeTontrade but we survived. Made us more resilient

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD A big loss to the policy, scholary and trade negoting community. Comes at a critical time when discussions on reforming the multilateral trading system are gathering momentum.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is sad news. Thanks for the great work, really enjoyed the articles. At a time when new takes on trade are more important than ever @ICTSD closure is an extremely big loss.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD You all will be greatly missed. Thank you for all the wonderful work on trade policy over the years! Best wishes for whatever the next steps are for all of you.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD @Psm_cuts hello sir, a sad day for the developing world!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Sad news indeed. I wish all of you the very best.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Very very sorry to hear about this . . .

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD The Center for Global Trade Analysis (GTAP) is saddened to hear of this.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Oh my god! :(

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Thank you so much for your good work and for our collaborations. ICTSD will be dearly missed! Good luck to everyone there for the future!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Thank you so much for everything, for years I have been reading and sharing your articles here and on LinkedIn, always with great interest. I know you'll find a new and better way to keep working for sustainable development. I wish you all the best.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is a great loss. I thank al the employees and wish them al the best for the future.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is a very sad news & a great loss for all involved in international trade policy. I have greatly enjoyed reading your publications over the years. Thanks so much for your work. At times like this, we need intelligent takes on trade policy more than ever! Tragic.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Am terrible sorry to hear this. The trade policy research landscape will never be the same again.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Thank you for your superb work over so many years & wishing whole team only the best. ICTSD was a model for many of other networks and TT including @ARTNeTontrade to follow. Your team's enthusiasm and contributions will be terribly missed. I hope there will be some remedy soon.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Sadness indeed. Thanks for everything, guys!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is so sad

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Sad news for the international trade communicty. ICTSD will me missed.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Really sad for the ICTSD staff and can only wish them all the best. ICTSD is irreplaceable and their demise is a massive loss. Was a privilege to play a small part in the ICTSD story. Thank you so much Ricardo, Christophe and all

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is such sad news. It is a huge loss for research and policy development

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is very sad for the international trade community.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Very sad news. Invaluable non-partisan source of high quality analysis, needed now more than ever. (I cannot 'like' this post). Many thanks to all who served the trade policy community and very best to you all.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Shocking news. ICTSD has been an amazing innovation hub, both in terms of sustainable development themes, and ways of brokering an informed dialogue on complex but vitally important issues. Congratulations to Ricardo, Christophe and the team, present and past. Be very proud.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Best wishes to all staff for the future. These are important issues, and they need dedicated experts.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is a loss. Grateful for the briefs and resources. Hoping for the best for everyone personally affected.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD This is tragic. A huge loss to the policy and scholarly community. Thank you for all your important work over the years.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @ICTSD Very sorry to hear about this - a great loss for the trade and development community. Thanks @ICTSD for the years of expert analysis and food for thought you've provided me with.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: This is most unfortunate! A great loss for policy research & researchers working on trade, environment, sustainable development..I have grown as a researcher following @ICTSD before publishing with you and joining @E15Initiative @RMelendezOrtiz wish there were ways to revive!!//t.co/2ZC4uT4uj3

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @lolygaitan @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Brutal...BRIDGES did an amazing job covering the #cotton initiative...Now who knows how we will learn about developments on that file moving forward #sad

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Very sad news, Ricardo. There is a strong need for a clear and credible voice on trade and sustainable development. And @ICTSD has been this voice for so many years. Hope there will be new opportunities.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: I completely agree with @KimAElliott #ICTSD is more relevant than ever. Muchas gracias @RMelendezOrtiz !//t.co/EeggC4WVgv

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Really so sorry to read this, Ricardo. Sad times for those underpinning constructive internationalism. Many thanks for all these years of fantastic work and best of luck for all of you at @ICTSD.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Very sad and shocking news. ICTSD has created such an impressive and necessary work programme over the years. @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD//t.co/3AWVo6bkPq

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Very sad news. I hope your legacy remains online at least & that you can somehow emerge again with stable & sufficient funding. name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK This is very sad. The end of an era I fear. These events do not bode well for our time.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK What a great loss for the Geneva community. Thanks to @RMelendezOrtiz and the entire ICTSD team for your tireless dedication over the years to make trade a more effective vehicle for sustainable development.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges @ICTSD_Bridges is an amazing resource. Its #influence in #trade #policy circles is impressive. Keep up the great work, @ICTSD @RMelendezOrtiz !

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges @ICTSD_Bridges is an amazing resource. Its #influence in #trade #policy circles is impressive. Keep up the great work, @ICTSD @RMelendezOrtiz !

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges @ICTSD_Bridges is an amazing resource. Its #influence in #trade #policy circles is impressive. Keep up the great work, @ICTSD @RMelendezOrtiz !

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: It is inexplicable to me that this is happening now, when a valuable resource like ICTSD is needed more than ever. Thank you @RMelendezOrtiz and your amazing team for all you've done to support the trade system and sustainable development initiatives over the years.//t.co/8ZraA74uLh

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Gutted to say goodbye to a trusted partner of so many meetings, research projects, publications, recently for gender responsive standards//t.co/qCvoWLu0wl Thank you to @ICTSD, to @RMelendezOrtiz and all present and past staff Hope to work with many of you in other fora.//t.co/ol09xSgSwq

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges What a great loss as ICTSD is announcing its closure! It has contributed tremendous amount of valuable literature and reports on wide range of development related topics including Intellectual Property & Development!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges Sustainability of public interest institutions is a major challenge amidst emergence of disturbing trends of environmental skepticism and protectionism in global politics.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Very unfortunate//t.co/QlgGFIAtxg

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK This is very sad. Hope you had considered other options before taking this permanent decision. name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Dear @RMelendezOrtiz . 22 years of innovative and inspiring vision on #Trade4Dev ! Chapeau! Thanks for your legacy, mentoring, leadership, contributions, networking and committed work building #Bridges aroundthe world. @ICTSD transcended!//t.co/AJukauXoC0

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: .@CIGIonline This is very sad news but we remain amazed by and grateful for the excellent work that was done by @ICTSD over the years. The need for thoughtful research on how to achieve the #SDGs is today more pressing than ever. @RMelendezOrtiz @RohintonMedhora//t.co/wx9Z8iBxS8

text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK Stand tall @RMelendezOrtiz . You have built an unforgettable legacy. Now we must create it again. No doubt on need for @ICTSD. A very big congratulations on your inspiring leadership on #Trade4Dev

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @Hepburn_JC @ICTSD Shocked to hear this. I wish you all the very best at this difficult time. Thanks Jonathan for involving me in your work on agriculture. name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @DanishMFA @Sida @DutchMFA @DFID_UK I am very sad to see this news. This is a disaster for trade policy development and for transparency. name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: Can't thank @ICTSD enough for all of the great work and resources. Great reading for anyone researching international trade/commerce.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: My personal thanks to @RMelendezOrtiz, @Hepburn_JC, latecomer @DmitryOpines, alumnus @TrineeshB and many others. ICTSD was a bastion for public accountability in world trade policies. We are losing one of the most valuable public assets in the field. 7/7

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges ICTSD is simply essential. The trade (and development) world is taking far too much crap these days, from high and low places. ICTSD's work is key to making sense of it all, now more than ever. We must not lose it, and most certainly not now!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges The work of @ICTSD is invaluable! @ICTSD_Bridges is the best source of diverse quality views on #trade #SDGs which we use in our work, refer to and share. Highly appreciated by policy-makers. If it didn't exist one would have to invent it!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: @RMelendezOrtiz @ICTSD @ICTSD_Bridges @ICTSD is an invaluable institution in the realm of #trade in the context of #sustainanabledevmlopment #SDGs #climate #fisheries etc. Excellent source of information, excellent policy dialogues and analysis - and I've always tremendously enjoyed working wih the team!

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: (3/3) After March 2019 the UK will be able to trade on its provisional schedules even if they are not certified, and use them to help mitigate the impact of no deal, should that be necessary.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: (2/3) Indeed, the EU is currently trading on uncertified schedules, and has been doing so for most of its membership of the @wto, because of its successive enlargements.

name: R Meléndez-Ortiz
text: (1/3) There is a misunderstanding, sometime wilful, how the @wto works. WTO members are able to trade on uncertified schedules in the WTO as they complete processes like the Article XXVIII negotiations the UK announced this week.

text: @AnnaStellinger @OscarStenstrom @UNCTAD @ICTSD @wto @SweMFA @Kommerskoll @setradepolicy @SwedeninAR @Sida @RMelendezOrtiz @EUmissionWTO This misses a key element: we need market systems to work (which includes both the public and private sectors). We need to focus on systemic change in inclusive markets so that women can have full opportunities in #trade. The 3 Rs alone are not enough.
